title: Replace Home page hero images with the last 3 uploaded images

requirements.text: Replace the three Home page hero section images with the last 3 images the user uploaded, replacing the currently hardcoded `heroImages` sources in both the ICP Home page and the non-ICP Home page.

quotes: mene jo last 3 images de thi un ko hero section vale image se replace kar do

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` no longer references the previous hero image paths (`/assets/Screenshot%202025-12-24%20153629.jpg`, `/assets/e00003_42eb4111f5ba46b39436fec811df105d~mv2.avif`, `/assets/e00003_b89bd166a314421cbcb505ffec9c884c~mv2.avif`) in the `heroImages` array.
`frontend/src/nonicp/pages/HomePage.jsx` no longer references the previous hero image paths in the `heroImages` array.
The hero section still renders exactly 3 images in the same layout/animations (1 large top image, 2 smaller bottom images) and uses the newly provided last-3 uploaded images for those three slots.
No broken images (no 404s) in the hero section for either ICP or non-ICP builds.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/components/ui`) must not be edited.
Keep all backend logic in the single Motoko actor (`backend/main.mo`); no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change any hero section copy, layout structure, animations, or styling beyond updating the image sources.
Do not implement new image upload functionality or admin tooling for managing hero images.
